Boğaziçi University: Boğaziçi University (Turkish: Boğaziçi Üniversitesi), also known as Bosphorus University, is a major research university in Istanbul, Turkey. Its main campus is located on the European side of the Bosphorus strait. It has six faculties and two schools offering undergraduate degrees and six institutes offering graduate degrees. Traditionally, the language of instruction is English.[6]
